oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of six World War I soldiers at Nashville, Tennessee, circa 1918
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of six World War I soldiers standing in front of a tent in the railroad gulch, Nashville, Tennessee, circa 1918. Forms part of the Nashville Room Historic Photographs Collection. 1 photograph : sepia ; 7.5 x 9.5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Military History; World War I; Capital City; World War, 1914-1918--Tennessee--Nashville; Military personnel--American--Tennessee--Nashville; Military service--United States; Soldiers--American--Tennessee--Nashville; Railroads--Tennessee--Nashville
Nashville (Tenn.)--History--Sources; Nashville (Tenn.)--Social conditions
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Wiles Nashville Tenn (Photographer)
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Special Collections Division of the Nashville Public Library, 615 Church Street, Nashville, Tennessee, 37219.
